channel.title: PDF Editor or Size Reducer
channel.description:
Hey mates,
Does anyone know of any good PDF editors or programs that will dramatically reduce the .pdf files size? Also if there is a program that can convert word files (.doc) to .pdf please let me know, I have tried a few already, but they didn't work well.
Thanks, Leader

item.title: PDF Editor or Size Reducer
item.dc:creator: @leader leader
item.description:
@leader wrote:

I bought acrobat reader 7 a long time ago, but it doesn’t work that well for me. I just used it before posting on here, and the .pdf file I created was 14mb. It was only 26 pages too! I have seen other .pdf files that have over 52 pages and are only 1 mb. So I need it to optimize or compress the files.

Read full topic

item.title: PDF Editor or Size Reducer
item.dc:creator: @YourDistracted YourDistracted
item.description:
@YourDistracted wrote:

Acrobat reader writer can convert stuff to .pdf its around 800$ dollars though. But theres probably some sort of crack for it…

Read full topic
